mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS member_id, email AS email, name AS name, phone AS phone, TO_CHAR(join_date, 'YY/DD/MM') AS join_date, code AS code, recode AS recode FROM member

SELECT search_keyword, search_count FROM ( SELECT search_keyword, COUNT(search_keyword) AS search_count FROM search_location_history GROUP BY search_keyword ORDER BY MAX(search_date) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 ORDER BY search_count DESC
SELECT search_keyword FROM search_location_history GROUP BY search_keyword ORDER BY search_keyword

SELECT TO_CHAR(search_date, 'yy/mm/dd') AS search_date, COUNT(*) AS search_count FROM search_location_history WHERE search_keyword = #{option} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(search_date, 'yy/mm/dd') ORDER BY SEARCH_DATE

SELECT m.*, s.recode_count AS count FROM member m INNER JOIN ( SELECT recode, COUNT(*) AS recode_count FROM member WHERE recode IS NOT NULL GROUP BY recode ) s ON m.code = s.recode order by count desc
mapper.insert: insert into point_table values(poi_id_seq.nextval, (select member_id from member where code =#{code}), sysdate,'너도나도캐시백',1000,'n')
mapper.select: select sum(poi_point) from point_table where member_id=#{memberId} and poi_type='y'
select * from point_table where member_id=#{memberId} and poi_type='n'
